name: Omnimon
effects: [When Digivolving] Choose 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Delete all of your opponent's Digimon that share a name with it.
[When Attacking] You can unsuspend this Digimon by returning 1 of this Digimon's level 6 digivolution cards to your hand.

name: DemiMeramon
effects: [When Attacking] When this Digimon attacks a player, it gets +1000 DP for the turn.

name: Kyaromon
effects: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When one of your opponent's digivolution cards is trashed, trigger ??Draw 1??. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Bibimon
effects: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] If you have 3 security cards, gain 1 memory.

name: Pagumon

name: Tai Kamiya
effects: [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon with [Agumon] or [Greymon] in its name moves from the breeding area to the battle area, gain 1 memory and trigger ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)[Main][Once Per Turn] Digivolve your [Agumon] into 1 [Agumon - Bond of Bravery] in your hand for its digivolution cost, ignoring its level. If you do, trash the top 2 cards of your security stack. Then, if you have 1 or more security cards, delete that Digimon at the end of the turn.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Sora Takenouchi & Mimi Tachikawa

name: Menoa Bellucci
effects: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.[Your Turn] When you play an [Eosmon], you may suspend this Tamer to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Tamer card or 1 Digimon card with [Eosmon] in its name among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.[Opponent's Turn] While you have an [Eosmon] in play, your opponent's Tamers don't unsuspend during their unsuspend phase.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
